https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mgOZRknirubzJ7vcyOPcbheY6SC.jpg When a new prescription drug permits a greater lucidity of one’s dreams, a woman resists her jealous husband’s demands that she induce a nightmare in order to scrub her subconscious of infidelity. A Thing of Dreams
